Muito viciante, só não é bem balanceado kkkkk, killer tem uma vantagem tremenda. Pra você escapar dele, precisa treinar muito todos os dias.
No mais, é um jogo muito divertido, principalmente com os amigos, terror puro !

BEST HORROR MULTYPLAYER GAME EVER ! 

Az összes killer egyszerűen fenomenális, az a atmoszféra amit adnak a killerek, nagyon kemény. A saját zenéjükkel, képeségükkel nagyon el lett az összes killer találva. Eleinte az összes killer op, de amint ki ismered őket, megtudod a gyenge pontjukat, már máris könnyebb lesz a helyzet :D

Látszik hogy a játékot fejlesztik rendesen, mivel egyre jobbak a mapok / killerek / survivalok ki dolgozása. Ennél a játéknál érzem azt a legjobban hogy kell a dlc ! Mivel annyira jók a dlck, egyszerűen azt érzem hogy "úuhf basszus kell ez a dlc geccó" és ha akciós akkor meg főleg ! egyszerűen itt volt a Stranger Things dlc hát nem is bírtam ki annyira kellet. Mivel imádom a sorozatot és az egyik kedvenc játékommá nőtte ki magát. A játékot mindenkinek ajánlom, egyedűl a 12 év alattiaknak nem, mivel azok eléggé foshatnak, bár rájuk bízom :D A játékra 10/10-et adok.

Из минусов:
Без DLC не такая интересная. Иногда встречаются токсик игроки которые либо специально шумят рядом с вами и показывают маньяку где ты, либо те которые тролят и дразнят маньяка который не может их поймать, система репортов никак не помогает, куча багов и одному нормально не поиграть
Из плюсов:
С друзьями играть очень весело как в своем лобби так и сдругим маньяком, выходят новые DLC с новыми картами выжившими и маньяками. Так же можно покупать скилы и маньяков за особую валюту которая добывается в игре

This game is pretty fun for any fans of horror games and movies. I don't know of any other games that have so many licensed characters together, from franchises such as Halloween, Saw, Stranger Things, and more. You can choose to play as a killer whose goal is to sacrifice all 4 survivors before they escape, or play as a survivor in a team of 4 as they try to escape the killer. The problems I have with this game is that the community can be pretty annoying and toxic at times, and the huge amount of DLCs and outfits that cost real money.
Played for a little bit. Seems ok I guess, but it's wtvr

Eu começei a jogar esse game como Sobrevivente, eu odiei e achei que nunca mais jogaria (nem era na minha conta). Meses depois eu estava conversando com um amigo e acabei interessado em testar o assassino, então comprei o jogo na promoção e me apaixonei pela jogabilidade dos Assassinos.

Ou seja, deem uma chance ao game, ele é muito bom e divertido. Pode ser que vc não se identifique com um dos lados ou pode ser que goste dos dois. Mas o jogo é bom demais, recomendo sem dúvidas <3

New killer The Executioner is so overpowered. Please patch this chapter and the killer.  Decisive strike and Deliverance are useless in this killer. He kills instantly no giving chance to run. I don't like this killer as a survivor. Please patch this.

Love this game if you like to play a game with a few friends this is the game. I myself play survivor a lot because of the surviving aspect but people may like being the killer hunting down the survivors. In all its a very well made game with few bugs but its really enjoyable. A+
Play this game its wicked awesome.

This is possibly THE most unique horror experience in gaming! The all-encompassing ensnaring of the senses required to play this game truly emulates everything people love about horror! Tropes, tricks, traps, the killers have everything they need to keep the survivors guessing and scared out of their minds! Add to all of that the fact that you can experience classic and modern slasher all-stars in gameplay, it's any horror lovers' dream! I can't wait to see what comes next!  When a company can make unique horror characters who stand up alongside familiar faces (masks) of the genre, it is definitely worth the time to check out!  Hooray for Indie gaming and Indie horror finally meeting and making amazing things happen!!!
Atmosphere of this game is great, and its really fun playing with friends ^v^

Un juego simple pero adictivo. Con la emoción de la persecución y la necesidad de estrategias para alcanzar la victoria. Algunos miembros de la comunidad suele ser tóxica en ocasiones, pero también hay gente muy buena que te apoya; no hay mucho que hacer al respecto. Sin embargo, un juego del que no me aburro nunca.

Y las colaboraciones son supremas. Muy buenas y asequibles.

this game is soooo fucking bad, but so god dam addictive.

The game has some things that really need to be fixed.
1. Fucking hitboxes. i'm still getting hit when the killer is 5m behind me.
2. Perks. some perks need a buff or a nerf. in my opinion i would like the old DS back from after this update.
3. Matchmaking. why does it have to take 50 min to find a match as survivor at 10PM, it's not even late like tf.

And here is a list for why i like the game.

1. I love it with friends its more fun with them.
2. Variation between killers and perks.
3. i like the concept of the game.
4. just seeing baby killers makes me laugh and i'll give them a hard time but in the end, i'll let them kill me

that was it ig, ty for reading.
and if you consider buying dbd after this revieuw, have some fun and play it with friends cause that is really fun.
